website_summaries.verdict: Though there's a slight risk you won't get a fresh batch, it's still worth trying If you prefer to grind your own. A favorite coffee in Italy that is gaining popularity around the world.
pros: A generous bag of whole beans roasted in Italy – a top-seller in that country for its fruity, nutty notes and balanced, medium flavor
Suited to be ground for espresso or drip coffee
cons: A few issues with flavor inconsistencies, likely due to approaching sell-by dates
A bit on the acidic side, which won't appeal to everyone

customer_reviews.title: The rock will break your grinder
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Lavazza Super Crema Whole Bean Coffee Blend, Medium Espresso Roast, 2.2-Pound Bag by Lavazza. The bean is ok, but the rock, which is never expected, brake the grinder of my Breville bes870xl espresso machine. That is a big cost for the bean. Not only the rock, I even find a piece of broken bone of bird. The rock was larger before being broken by the grinder.
customer_reviews.author: littlesong

customer_reviews.title: Found a rock in the beans
customer_reviews.text: We love Lavazza at our house. Especially the Super Crema. However, in our most recent bag there was a rock. We found this out during the grinding process in a rather expensive espresso machine. We were able to remove it, but only time will tell if damage was done. I'd recommend inspecting the beans closely before running them through your machine.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie P. Hartsell

customer_reviews.title: Got a stale bag of burnt tasting coffee!
customer_reviews.text: Tasted like burnt coffee. Had the throw away almost the whole bag after several attempts at trying to improve the taste. Not drinkable. I have ordered this exact coffee from Amazon on approx 4 different occasions and NEVER had anything but 5 star coffee. I couldn’t believe it when I opened this bag. SO upset. It was my favorite coffee but now I’m not going to spend that much money and roll the dice on my luck on trying to get a fresh bag. Going to have to look elsewhere for coffee. Won’t be getting it from Amazon ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: They don’t call it super crema for nothing!
customer_reviews.text: They don’t call it super crema for nothing! This coffee surpassed my expectations. I was hoping to get a newly roast coffee beans and I got the one roasted from January 2017 BUT when I tasted it I was blown away. It’s very decadent, very creamy! I’m gonna buy more from this company and try other versions. I will recommend this to my relatives and friend.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy Abey

customer_reviews.title: Bitter old coffee beans
customer_reviews.text: I am almost done suffering through this two pounds of horrible coffee. Every morning I start with a cup of this bitter bean and look forward to the end of this bag so I can find a proper fresh coffee bean. I tried french press and filter drip, as well as several proportions. Nothing helps. Expect to have to kill the awful aftertaste with cream and sugar. Or, if you are like me, who prefers fresh quality beans that produce nice flavorful, aromatic, non-burnt-tasting cup of coffee, then stay away from this Super Crema. The "manufacturing" date (which I assume is roasting date) stamped on the bag was 5 months prior to my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: WiseShopper

customer_reviews.title: Bitter old taste
customer_reviews.text: Easily the worst coffee I have ever had. I used a drip maker, french press, even a stove top espresso maker. each time it made a bitter cup. The taste reminded me of an old cup of diner coffee that had been sitting on a hotplate too long. I don't know if it was just the bag I had, given all of the other positive reviews, but I tried another blend of Lavazza and it was OK but what I would expect more for the price. I will not buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: PadraicHI

customer_reviews.title: Great Espresso Beans AND NO ROCKS EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I have been buying these beans for over 20 years for use in our super automatic espresso machine. Obviously we like it very much....tastes great and dry enough to not clog my machine. Lavazza is after all one of the leading expresso companies in Italy, so they must be doing something right. And as to those reviewers commenting that they are finding rocks in their beans??? I have to say I have NEVER had that experience EVER in the hundreds of bags we have bought over the years. It is just not something I worry about in the least. Buy it and enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: TJ in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Lavazza has gone way downhill
customer_reviews.text: I recently started making coffee at home again, after a couple of years of not doing so. I usually bought Lavazza before, and often the super crema. It was always good before, but this is terrible. It's bitter, harsh, and overroasted. I don't know if they decided to lower their quality standards for the US market (I can't imagine that they get away with selling this in Italy) but it's time to switch brands. It's a shame, because Lavazza has always been great.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Year-old coffee beans delivered? 👎 No thanks!
customer_reviews.text: Be careful of your manufacture date. These beans were purchased the the Amazon Lavazza stop -  The beans shipped to me were a-year-old with the manufacture date of 2/2018. This has been noted before & obviously it’s still a problem with Amazon purchases. I’ll send them back and just buy them from a store nearby - & pay the extra for fresh beans.
customer_reviews.author: bob2k2

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Stale, bitter, boring.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something to tie me over between my Blue Bottle coffee subscription orders. Based on the good rating I thought I'd try Lavazza. For it's age (6 months since roast) it's still producing a good amount of crema, but it's pretty flat, bitter, and flavourless. There are better options on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: what an amazing Espresso roast
customer_reviews.text: what an amazing Espresso roast, not overly roasted line much of the espressos in the US. If you are expecting a dark, oily roast this is NOT the Espresso for you. Espresso does not need to be this black bitter tar that some expect it to be. Lavazza Super Crema is one of my favorites, beautifull brown bean that when ground correctly will yield an amazing shot of sweet creamy espresso topped with thick crema, done right it will have notes of mandarin orange. soooooooo much better than the over roasted BS we so often find in the US.
customer_reviews.author: Corey M.

customer_reviews.title: Good beans for my superautomatica coffee maker -  no rocks lol, but the dates are inconsistant
customer_reviews.text: I kind of laughed when I read about the rocks, but I guess it's not too funny if it happened to you. Just in case I pour these into a white bowl first then transfer them into my superautomatica machine, making sure no foreign objects have contaminated the product as has been reported a couple years ago. My only complaint is the first couple bags I ordered were just a few weeks old, then I was sent some that were 5 months old which I found odd. Yes, they were different but both made good coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Garbage Beans
customer_reviews.text: I bought these beans to use in my Breville barista express, and with all the positive reviews I thought this was going to be a great option for my coffee addiction. ALL THE REVIEWS ARE LIES!!!!!!! These beans taste like burnt stale Folgers coffee, and now I have 2.2lbs of these garbage beans. I could barely choke down one Americano. Do not buy these beans if you are used to good coffee made by brands like Stumptown, Intelligentsia, and groundworks. I am never going to buy this again, and you should just save your money and move on.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Hershey

customer_reviews.title: it's not just coffee, its an experience
customer_reviews.text: The first time I tried this is when I purchased my Rancilio silvia, and this was the coffee recommended for its robust but (not bitter taste) that was in 07. Now, I want that same experience and even after putting a bit of 1/2&1/2 at the bottom of my warmed cup, it still has a nice creme, oh yes! Though, even the Dunkin beans are good, its the overall flavor that isn't lost in the brewing. The best thing with Amazon, if you're not satisified you can return it. Of course within the allot time. The cost is comparable to any other coffee that you don't get a full pound, and here with this you get 2!
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Bought for BREVILLE Express Espresso machine
customer_reviews.text: I wanted the very best coffee for my new espresso machine and bought three varieties. Starbucks Espresso, Kicking Horse Kick Ass, and this.. Lavazza Super Crema. If you would’ve asked me what was probably the best roast I would’ve said dark and because I love Starbucks I would’ve said that brand.. but using 6 ounce glasses and a double shot per cup I prefer the Lavazza medium roast and was shocked that there is so little bitterness but still so much complex rich flavor. I suppose if I had a different machine my favorite could’ve went another way..but I am blown away at the taste of Lavazza Super Crema. So good... what’s a Starbucks!!??? What? 😋
customer_reviews.author: BluesHarp

customer_reviews.title: I have ordered this brand multiple times - Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this brand multiple times, the bag has always come vacuum sealed. There were no visible signs the bag was open or leaking, but, the top fold was not down and flat like it usually is. The product was placed in a yellow padded envelope, not even a box to protect the bag. The person stuffing it had to know it was not vacuum sealed, because the bag was mushy and the beans were rattling. It is not worth my time to send it back or ask for a new one, but, hopefully this review will serve as a reminder to do a quality check prior to sending it out.
customer_reviews.author: William Gallo

customer_reviews.title: Best espresso and lots of Crema!
customer_reviews.text: Best tasting espresso ever! Have been using it in my DeLonghi Magnifica XS for over 8 months. Have had no problem with the bean grinder in my machine because these beans have the right amount of oil to not jam up the grinder. Really enjoy the Super Crema because we really like that extra creamy rich top. This is the smoothest espresso I have ever had. We buy it by the case so we always have plenty on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: STONES!
customer_reviews.text: STONES, STONES, STONES!!!!!! I had read other reviews about stones in with the coffee beans. IT IS TRUE!!! I am so disappointed because I absolutely love this coffee! Having said that, I have NO RESPECT for a company that uses such lax quality control! Inexcusable! I don’t care how good the coffee is, I cannot risk damage to my $4,000.00+ coffee machine because this company refuses to institute common sense quality standards, especially since this has been a known issue!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Antonios Chryssos

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality.
customer_reviews.text: I had really high hopes for these beans but they just didn’t meet my expectations. First they didn’t grind well in my coffee grinder, granted I don’t have a fancy grinder but I’ve used many different brands and they ground fine. I had it set to the finest ground setting and the beans still came out kind of chunky. Like the beans are too hard or something. The flavor is also not great. There is a lot of crema though if that’s what your looking for. Overall I won’t be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Roasted 3 months ago
customer_reviews.text: I bought a second bag because I thought the first must be a coronavirus shipping delay but, no, this was again roasted three months ago. They can claim a two year shelf life all they want, they didn't reinvent the rules of chemistry by putting them in a bag. Your shots will be all over the map. I'm hardly a coffee zealot but if you own an expensive espresso machine and put beans roasted 3 months ago into it, you aren't doing better than a pod.
customer_reviews.author: H. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Taste great. It has a chocolate flavor.
customer_reviews.text: It tastes good. The manufacturing date is 03/22/2020. I got it 08/3/2020. Over 4 months. I just started making espresso so I'm not sure if that's a long time. It also has a 2 year BB date. It's sealed really tight though and there are a lot of different types of beans in the bag. I think that's why it has such a long shelf life. It tasted good on my first try so I'm happy with it. Great fast delivery by Amazon as always.
customer_reviews.author: tony sisson

customer_reviews.title: Best coffee on the market works perfectly with Jura expresso machines
customer_reviews.text: I have been reordering this for months. Live in Seattle so we don’t lack coffee places but this is sooo my to go to coffee and I can tell the difference right away. Own a Jura S8 espresso maker and I was worried about oily coffee beans since it could damage the machine but this is just perfect in every aspect. I hope they never stop making it. My husband gets eczema form cheap coffee or even Starbucks coffee but no problem at all with this one. Our family is hooked 😂🥰 and each time I ordered we get a fresh batch made within a month or so never stale and smells heavenly
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Best espresso I've had
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous about this product the first time I used it because the date showed it was 5 months old. But that wasn't a problem. The beans are excellent and make a fantastic cup. The crema is thick, aroma is great and the taste just about the best I've ever had. We have a Saeco Incanto Superautomatic machine and it works great with this coffee. One note, if you're used to very dark, oily beans, you might be surprised at the color and consistency. European espresso roasts, like this one, are lighter and drier but still produce strong, delicous coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent vacuum packaging
customer_reviews.text: Inconsistent freshness. I really enjoy these beans when they arrive still vacuum packed. We’ve ordered several times and a couple of instances the bag was no longer vacuum sealed and beans tasted poor. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Schroder

customer_reviews.title: Sooo disappointed... l didn't get happy tasting this coffee
customer_reviews.text: Don't see what the hype is all about. I've had better generic gas station coffee. Maybe, they have a flavor l would love, but this isn't it. If anyone has any recipes that l could try, let me know. I have a frother, but not exactly sure how to get it thick and frothy on top like you get at Starbucks. I tried it with heavy cream and almond milk, but it didn't turn out. Maybe, i'm doing something wrong. Anyhow, I like Starbucks coffee if Lavazza had a flavor that might be close, let me know by posting it. Thx
customer_reviews.author: Sab

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent product dating & freshness
customer_reviews.text: Purchased again in Jan. 2018 - when I opened the shipping box, the coffee packaging had a pierced hole in it, thus the coffee wasn't sealed air tight for freshness. Very disappointed. :( Product appears to have been defective before it was ever packed for shipment. Quality control issue in my opinion. Previous review: When beans are super fresh, it makes yummy lattes with lots of crema. Unfortunately, the product dating (freshness) when purchased online is not consistent. I wish there was a way to know product dating at time of purchase rather than taking pot luck. The beans I ordered this week are already 3 months old :( Downside of buying online.
customer_reviews.author: LBC

customer_reviews.title: So Smooth
customer_reviews.text: This is the smoothest espresso I’ve ever had. I have a Breville espresso machine and make americanos mostly. I usually buy Peet’s and Starbucks. I prefer Peet’s of those two and think it’s pretty smooth. But, Lavazza Super Crema is wonderful if you are looking for extra smooth. It’s not bitter or burnt tasting at all. This is a nice roast for espresso machines.
customer_reviews.author: The Warren’s

customer_reviews.title: Was skeptical because of negative comments but mine turned out all right
customer_reviews.text: I read lots of comments of other customers reporting the stones in their coffee beans, I was a little hesitant to order but decided to try because of other good reviews and because of the brand. Just got mine today and just tried it. The taste is very reach and there is nice texture. I didn't get any stones in my bag, maybe I was lucky, maybe they are sitting on the bottom of the beg or maybe they improved quality (the bad reviews were from 2018). Anyway, Just wanted to share my positive experience so far. If I find the stones later on I will update my review.
customer_reviews.author: NetCostComputers.com

customer_reviews.title: A well balanced blend. Good price.
customer_reviews.text: My bag did not have rocks. Just coffee. The bag wasn't vacuum sealed but the beans were fresh. I've heard a lot about Italian coffees and was pleased to see it available on Amazon. It was a good price too so I tried it. I usually buy whole beans from either Peet's or Starbucks. No regrets. The blend makes a good strong cup of coffee. I used some in reusable k-cups and it was great. Used some I'm my French press and it was awesome. I usually spend $12 to $15 for a pound. This works out to less than $9 lb. Wow.
customer_reviews.author: jim

customer_reviews.title: 63 Bags of Lavazza Super Crema and Not One Rock
customer_reviews.text: Other reviewers are complaining about rocks in their bags but we have ordered 63 bags of Lavazza Super Crema and never seen a rock. We put the beans in an all-in-one espresso/coffee maker. I look forward to my steaming hot cup of aromatic and flavorful coffee every morning. There's always a lovely layer of Crema on top. We'll try other flavors but this one is a winner.
customer_reviews.author: The Compari-Shopper

customer_reviews.title: What's up with this particular variety from them!
customer_reviews.text: I've read the reviews. This particular flavor is hands down the favorite, and the most criticized for it's inconsistency. From what I can figure is that it's not distributed in the US, so it's imported by resellers. There's either a huge quality control issue in this process or it's being counterfeited. I'm going to stick with the Crema e Aroma. It's had great luck with it, and they seem to be able to get it here more consistently. I tried the Illy this time around, and it's okay, but not as good as the Crema e Aroma IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas W.

customer_reviews.title: Beans tasted great, but check that date
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy Lavazza beans, and these were good as usual. They weren't oily and the value for the money was great, hence the high overall rating. Only note: The bag I received was several months old, and my coffee snob friends always say that the roast date matters. If you care about the date your coffee was packaged, this may not be the bag of beans for you.
customer_reviews.author: JoshEEE

customer_reviews.title: Best coffee beans!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've tasted a lot of coffee all around the world and hands down Lavazza produces one of the best coffee beans! This particular blend, Super Crema, is my favorite. I always come back to this one. The descriptions says it has this mild and creamy medium espresso roast with notes of hazelnuts and brown sugar - it was spot on! Because of the notes of brown sugar it gives you this caramel taste which I love. I've used this for espressos, lattes, americano, french press, drips, etc....and the taste is just amazing. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: M.A.C

customer_reviews.title: DELICIOUS!
customer_reviews.text: I was getting tired of using K-cups in my Keurig and started thinking about different ways to drink coffee, starting with freshly ground coffee beans. I'm glad I decided to try this Lavazza Super Crema in my new Barista Warrior French press as it was absolutely delicious. Fresh, smooth, not bitter at all. I'm waiting for my Breville espresso machine to be delivered, so I can try the Lavazza as an espresso as well. I'm sure it will be great, if I enjoyed it so much in my French press. Highly recommend this coffee and will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: M.A.T

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure coffee connoisseurs (which I'm not) have other ideas on what is "good" coffee, but for my taste and my wife's, Lavazza's Super Crema and Gran Crema are our go-to's. So much better than typical coffees we used to buy on the shelves at local grocery stores and other local chains. Obviously, taste is subjective, but my wife any I both agree on this one. Smooth, great flavor. Can't wait for my next cup!
customer_reviews.author: Scott S.

customer_reviews.title: Not so great compared to others I’ve had
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this, but it’s really acidic and bitter for my liking. I got a manual espresso maker for my birthday so that I can actually get a true hand pulled shot. I normally use Guatemalan single origin beans, but like a darker roast on occasion. I bought this because I like a good heady espresso and this does have a nice bit of Crema to the top of your shot, but so do most if you pull your shot right. The sweet, warm notes that the brand boasts, do exist, but they are at the bottom of the cup. It’s a really nice finish, but not consistent throughout the shot.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Espresso!
customer_reviews.text: After trying many different types of Espresso I have found the one that I order over and over again (in fact I just subscribed to it!). I like to have a cappuccino in the morning and espresso later in the day. This roast is very nice in that it is not bitter at all, and is very fresh tasting. It is strong enough to be mixed with milk in espressos and is not so strong as to be bitter when by itself. Definitely recommend for any coffee aficionado.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Smith

customer_reviews.title: SMOOTHEST COFFEE EVER
customer_reviews.text: We have a Barista Express machine and have used everything you can imagine in it. We even joined a few coffee clubs to get fresh ground coffee and just hadn't found the one for us. UNTIL NOW! We just purchased this and used it for the first time today. It is so smooth and taste great. My wife and I were both in shock but also very happy. It's cheaper than most we were purchasing and we both like it so it's a win-win. Hope you enjoy it as much as we do.
customer_reviews.author: AngelmanBlog

customer_reviews.title: Weak and watered down espresso. A fail!
customer_reviews.text: Having high expectations for a high quality espresso from Italy, this product falls short. I was temporarily using a Publix store branded espresso which was a fraction of the cost and therefore had low expectations. Turns out it’s way more robust than this Lavazza coffee. I will now mix it with the Publix brand so I don’t have to tolerate its watered down flavor. If you like your espresso weak and watery then this product may be a good fit for you otherwise the Italians threaten their own reputation by exporting this subpar product.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Cartelli

customer_reviews.title: Very smooth taste! Don't be tricked by the exp date....
customer_reviews.text: First off, a lot of people are mistaken unthinking they are getting either really old beans or beans made in the future. The dates on the bag are in European format, day/month/year or year/month/day. The bag I received was roasted less than a month ago. Flavor is fantastic. Big, bold roast without bitterness. And no rocks! Those review really had me worried, but I've received two separate bags in the past 3 months, and I carefully searched through the bags. Just beans.
customer_reviews.author: Lucien

customer_reviews.title: I got rocks too!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought the $700 Breville Express and had bought these beans. The grinder jammed and I also found little rocks. I figured where else could they come from but the beans but also thought that was crazy too so I didn't seek a refund. Only post now as a warning to your expensive grinders! Hopefully they get this figured out as the coffee tastes fine.
customer_reviews.author: Camy Faircloth

customer_reviews.title: Lavazza Super Crema Whole Bean Coffee is Not Freshly Roasted
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing a Breville Espresso Express machine last month I searched for the best beans to brew and chose Lavazza Super Crema Whole Bean Coffee Blend based on reviews and ordered it on Amazon. It arrived yesterday. Reading the packaging label on the coffee I was very surprised to see it's roasting date was over four months ago. Breville's instructions are very explicit about purchasing FRESHLY ROASTED beans. These are not. If you're looking for freshly roasted beans you may have to find a local roaster and not depend on Lavazza or Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Bert Fox

customer_reviews.title: Very dark and bitter, little crema
customer_reviews.text: This was falsely advertised as medium roast and rich crema ; Far from it!. Very dark and little crema. Not sure where all those high rating are coming from. Amazon reviews are becoming a syndicated advertisement and maybe there are contractors for that (to provide high volume reviews....) Anyway, at least this is my personal opinion in case someone is interested to know. I know what an Italian coffee and how should it taste. This is as lame and as burned as Starbucks coffee is.
customer_reviews.author: Maccer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: These beans produce the best espresso I have ever tasted. I've been drinking espresso/Latte's for about a year now. I was originally getting them from starbucks ( lower case on purpose) That didn't last long. Over priced and not very good. Found a bag a Lavazza at the local grocer and decided to tried it. It was ground espresso and I really liked it so I decided that I would grind my own beans and make my own espresso/Latte's. Definitely worth the money and I haven't found any rocks...Enjoy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Super Automatic Espresso Machines
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this specifically for use with a super-automatic espresso machine. These machines need medium roast, non-oily beans. I tested with a Saeco and De'Longhi machine and both had no problem grinding properly and producing good crema. I'll have a few weeks of espresso with the 2lb bag before I need to decide if I want to try other roasts or stick with the Super Crema. I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: J. Oliver

customer_reviews.title: I usually prefer Dark, but this Medium is very robust!
customer_reviews.text: I like Lavazza, and have ordered other variations before. I usually get a bag of Lavazza when I'm looking for an Italian "roast." Normally, I prefer a shiny dark roast. From ordering many different varieties of whole bean coffees on Amazon, I've found that the medium roasts on here are typically weak. That said, Lavazza has never disappointed. I love this medium roast. Every medium roast of Lavazza I've tried has been amazing and this bag was no different. Will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Daveheart

customer_reviews.title: Great value for learning how to make espresso
customer_reviews.text: I like this as an at home espresso novice. It wasnt too expensive that I didnt mind throwing away coffee since I'm just learning how to make. The coffee is pretty smooth with a bit of sweetness. Pretty nice flavor for an everyday drink. Way better than buying starbucks or anything of the sort. I put in about 20 ml of sugar free vanilla or peppermint of I'm feeling really frisky lol. I'm currently using the breville smart grinder and rancilio silvia v3. I will probably buy another bag while I continue to practice before I spring for a more expensive bag of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It tasted like CHEMICALS!!!
customer_reviews.text: This "coffee" tasted like CHEMICALS and it might be dangerous for your health. It did not smell like a coffee at all. It had a very strong chemical smell. I was afraid even try it when I brew it. There was zero crema, too. I have tried every Lavazza coffee you can buyon the market (I am from Europe) and never had such a BAD coffee in my whole life. Do you a favor, do not buy this coffee. It is non-returnable garbage, you will just lose your money.
customer_reviews.author: Harley

customer_reviews.title: If I only had one bean, this would be it!
customer_reviews.text: I almost hate to give this to review it deserves because I don't want others to find out about it. This is by far one of the smoothest espressos I've used. Not only does it have a natural chocolatey sweetness to it, it almost seems velvety. I have used this for pour over, french press and even cold brew and can't find fault with any of it. If I had one bean to choose from for the rest of my life it would be this bean. I only wish there was a way of ordering direct small batches to get sample the freshest bean possible.
customer_reviews.author: Shone R.

customer_reviews.title: Quality is considerably down
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure if Amazon is storing this longer or the quality has gone down drastically. I cannot get that creme anymore from recent bags. The old packaging was much better in locking the freshness. Not only that, my espresso machine is unable to extract the espresso within the pressure range. My machine is still good as it is working perfectly with locally bought beans. Removing from my subscription and will be buying locally.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Guru

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor and value
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried so far about 8 different brands of coffee in my espresso machine and this one is definitely at the top in terms of flavor. The surprising thing is that this is the cheapest of all the ones I’ve tried so I plan to stick with this one for a while. I was using Illy before and this one has a similar flavor as that but is much cheaper. It’s a very large bag so I had to store the beans in an airtight container because it will take me a while to use it all, but that’s a good problem to have lol.
customer_reviews.author: MCA

customer_reviews.title: Bland flavor, not memorable
customer_reviews.text: Considering espresso is about taste and quality, this particular espresso being doesn't have a memorable taste. It tastes rather bland and has a nutty flavor, but otherwise, there's very little sweetness. I've prepared this espresso similarly to the intelligencia black cat espresso beans, and the intelligencia beans taste way way better. The black cat intelligencia cost twice as much, but when we're thinking about espresso, twice as much per cup is a difference of around $0.25 per cup, which isn't much if you care about your espresso taste.
customer_reviews.author: Long N.

customer_reviews.title: Love these beans!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing magical beans!! I’ve used these beans in a moka and an espresso machine and they are absolutely delicious every time. I’m new to the espresso world so I’m not going to pretend i know all about the berry notes or whatever. All I know is that I am so happy to have bought this bag. The bag was made right as I ordered it and the beans are super fresh. The smell when I opened the bag was heavenly and makes me so happy whenever I open the jar I keep them in. I’m gonna go make a cup now lol
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Year and half old beans delivered ? 👎 No Thanks!
customer_reviews.text: Be careful of your manufactured date. Mine were delivered today 6/21/18 with a Manufactured date of 1/8/2017. Feel like this is old stock and would definitely not be fresh. Very surprised these are being sold.
customer_reviews.author: CigarDaze

customer_reviews.title: Good crema, too bitter for me
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use with my Superautomatic espresso machine. It’s a bit too bitter for my taste, I’ve had better flavors from Lavazza. The beans were very uneven, some were medium roast some were dark. I went thru the entire bag to make sure it did not have any rocks as others have mentioned and mine did not have rocks. It was roasted in nov 2019. Once you open the bag there is no twisty tie to reseal the bag so you must get a container before you open the bag!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Wow...really good / smooth coffee!
customer_reviews.text: I love this coffee. I'm on my forth purchase and have yet to be disappointed. I do a two to one mix of two parts Lavazza to one part french roast just to stretch out the purchase of this amazing coffee. I'm hooked on this Super Crema. The beans are of a caramel brown in color as is the crema when ran through my Breville espresso maker. You will love this coffee! Creamy, smooth and and very nice on the palette.
customer_reviews.author: Ssssnice

customer_reviews.title: 6mo old coffee from this seller
customer_reviews.text: Today is September 18th and coffee is brewed March 22. Already 6mo old so if you like old coffee go for it
customer_reviews.author: My stuff

customer_reviews.title: Something wrong with QC?
customer_reviews.text: Lavazza, I suggest you check on your quality control. I ran some of the latest pack I received (December 2018) and it caused a weird acrid smell coming out of my espresso machine (Jura ENA 5). It also had a strange taste something like the taste of burnt tomatoes. I've been buying Lavazza Coffee for around 2 years now and I would love to see an improvement in quality. Until this is rectified I wouldn't buy any more of this coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for a low cost espresso bean
customer_reviews.text: Awesome deal for a lot of coffee! I usually purchase house blends and small toaster shop beans. I haven’t been out as much and decided to just order some cheap beans online for my espresso machine that I can use when I’m in-between higher end bags. This coffee actually turned out great though, and I’ll have no problem using it as long as needed until I can get back out to the shops! Great espresso pulls and it tastes like great basic coffee
customer_reviews.author: Chase S.

customer_reviews.title: Buying online is a Gamble - It's better to buy local
customer_reviews.text: This has a great taste, but given the uncertainty of freshness when buying online, it's nothing to write home about. Seems like you get to gamble when buying coffee online. Purchased this in January 2018 and the packaging date is from May 2017. The lack of freshness is apparent and I'm not getting anywhere near the amount of crema that I hoped with a product titled "super crema." Definitely very disappointing when I can stop by the local store and pickup coffee that is fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny G

customer_reviews.title: Wow.  I mean......... WOW.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AMAZING. When I pour water into the french press full of fresh ground super crema, it sounds like I'm making a milkshake, it's so creamy and thick. It's just absolutely insane how thick, rich and creamy this coffee is. I don't use cream or sugar at all. I was a 2 sugar and peanut butter color creamer guy before. Now it's straight black and beautiful. Try this stuff, I'm telling you it's rediculously good.
customer_reviews.author: OPR

customer_reviews.title: When It Comes To This Coffee Snob, Lavazza Super Crema is my Yoda
customer_reviews.text: Hands down my absolute favorite manufacturer and love the Super Crema blend. I go through a lot considering I’m the only one in the household so I’m on the hunt for a less expensive but still great flavored and strong cup of coffee to slap me in the face when I wake up in the morning. So far just finding blends that mist my face with scented spring water so my hunt continues. May end up coming back to this in the end. Find something else to slash in my monthly budget to keep me in Lavazza. Perhaps deodorant or toothpaste - just kidding.
customer_reviews.author: JAF in Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Breville Barista grinder settings.
customer_reviews.text: Alright folks, there's not much I can add to gazillion reviews about the taste of this coffee. In short, as all have said, it tastes great and i think I am beginning to prefer this blend to the Lavazza single origin beans. If you have a Breville Barista coffee machine, grinding these beans on 8 to 10 (double filter) should give you a perfectly dry puck and an insanely flavorful crema and aroma.
customer_reviews.author: SteveMayberry

customer_reviews.title: Great Coffee.. look out for rocks though
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews i was cautious when pouring beans into my grinder, checking them every time by sifting through them. Found a huge rock in the first bag i ordered, no rocks so far on the second(bought again cause good coffee). So if you do buy these... pour the beans into a bowl or something before dumping into the grinder, it is worth the time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five month old roast date and lots of pieces parts....
customer_reviews.text: Ordered even after reading the reviews of old roast dates and rocks in the beans, but wanted to give Lavazza Super Crema a shot since I've heard so much good about it. Well I did get a 5 month old roast and lot's of pieces parts of beans but it does make pretty good espresso. Searching for rocks before I grind does take some of the fun out of making a shot so I probably will look elsewhere for a more reliable source in the future and give this another shot!
customer_reviews.author: SteveL

customer_reviews.title: I love the coffee, but...
customer_reviews.text: It is delicious if you can get a bag that is sealed properly and was roasted recently, and that is hit and miss. I have ordered it many times, most often the roast date is within 3 months, but I have had it as long ago as a year. This time it was roasted 6 months ago and the bag was loose rather than vacuum sealed. Amazon is great and replacing it with no hassle, but its a bummer that you can't get fresher coffee. Check those dates.
customer_reviews.author: Dandy

customer_reviews.title: Delicious coffee, but too oily for espresso grinder
customer_reviews.text: Bought a bag of this for my son, who has a decent cappuccino machine (Breville) with a built in grinder. He absolutely will not use it in the machine since the beans are too oily. He showed me the difference between good beans (the kind he buys at a couple of different local shops) and these, and Lavazza are certainly shinier, with some tiny drops of oil clinging to them if you look close. So I was left with this large bag. I grind it in a cheap Krups coffee grinder and make drip coffee with it, which is delicious. So, 5 stars as coffee. 1 star as espresso.
customer_reviews.author: Brian M.

customer_reviews.title: Great taste and smooth quality
customer_reviews.text: I am by no means a coffee expert. I purchased this based on some online reviews of espresso beans in general. Now, I am on my second bag and signed up for the subscription. These beans work great in my automatic machine. They are not oily so they do not get stuck and gunk everything up. Some espresso gives me heartburn but I can drink multiple cups of this coffee in a day and have no issues. The one negative is that I am being spoiled with this level of coffee. I am noticing that I no longer like the coffee at work because it is nowhere near the quality of Lavazza.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Over a year old.
customer_reviews.text: Received a 2.2 lbs bag today, 8/8/19, with a manufactured date of 7/25/18. Over one year old? Zero stars!
customer_reviews.author: KLPW

customer_reviews.title: Nice ones for the price
customer_reviews.text: I order these regularly, the beans are pretty good but not as great as freshly roasted beans. The benefits are longer shelf life and nice crema. The caveat is that if the crema is left out for a while until you steam the milk, the coffee can become a little bitter. Overall great beans, but again not as flavorful as freshly roasted ones, but like I said, at this price that's a given.
customer_reviews.author: Hammad Jilani

customer_reviews.title: Perfect compliment to higer-end coffee makers.
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly smooth, creamy and delicious. If you love coffee as I suppose you do since you are reading this, then this is going to do it for you. We have a Jura C60 and decided to try the expresso beans and we are sure glad we did. The coffee is rich and creamy like the coffee you'd expect to get in fine coffee shops in Europe. I look forward to my morning coffee every morning because of Lavazza. Dump your k-cups and get yourself a high quality machine so you can grind your own beans and make your high-end coffee & expresso, you'll be glad you did!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Amazing flavor
customer_reviews.text: I worked at a local coffee shop in my home town a few years back and this was what we used for espresso so I bought it for home. The espresso it made was creamy, velvety, and smooth. Just amazing. I don’t have an espresso machine but I figured it would probably be good as just a brewed coffee. I was so right. It’s just an amazing bean with multiple brew options. When I use it for French press I still get the crema, which is fun. I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ally Halverson

customer_reviews.title: Best espresso I have found
customer_reviews.text: I searched for years for a consistently good espresso bean.. I tried super expensive custom roasts from all coffee regions of the world and had always figured this was a commercial brand so could not hold up. I finally tried it when a Jura machine was demonstrated to me in a high end cooking store. I loved it and was shocked how much less expensive it was than all the fancy stuff I had tried. Now it is my go to every morning. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: AD the consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great Medium roast blend. consistently make a great cup of espresso
customer_reviews.text: My Wife and I have the Oracle Expresso machine and the lavazza crema espresso beans make an amazing cup of coffee for us. I like the medium roast in an expresso bean, many of the espresso beans are a dark roast, and have been really happy with the constant quality that lavazza seems to produce. we keep the beans in our freezer to try and keep them fresh, it would be nice if Lavazza added a roasted on date, instead of a use by date, so that you could know the date that your beans were roasted, other than that there is nothing I would change about these beans!
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Kachmar

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this espresso roast Lavazza coffee, it is my absolute favorite for an Americano!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a few issues with shipping in the past but for the most part Amazon does an excellent job of providing fresh Lavazza coffee at affordable prices. I took advantage of a subscribe and save but had to cancel it as I forgot to suspend it when I was away for 8 months! lol My fault not Amazon's, anyways with this Covid19 thing, I now am quite pleased to have an ample supply of my favorite brew!!
customer_reviews.author: E. G.

customer_reviews.title: And I thought Illy coffee was good
customer_reviews.text: This and the blue bag Lavazza coffee beans are fantastic. I was exposed to this coffee upon my visit at the University of Pavia near Milan a few years back, Italy. It is my daily coffee and I have made so many of my relatives and friends attracted to this coffee, so that I should be their (Lavazza) spokesman. Once you try this coffee you will never go back to other brands. Life is too precious and too short to have poor coffee. Go Lavazza Supper Crema! I love it! Please buy the whole beans and grind them just before using. Some Italian refined coffee flavor is great.
customer_reviews.author: Vassilios A.

customer_reviews.title: GROSS
customer_reviews.text: Gag 🤮 these beans are NASTY. They smell bad, taste bad, look dry & are stale. Not sure if I got a bad batch but something is wrong. I have a Breville Barista Express & bought these because the reviews said they're great espresso beans but it literally taste horrible, like dirt & it smells really off when grinding & brewing. I don't know why I ever strayed from my Starbucks Espresso beans, they're the best. Very unhappy with this purchase. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful flavor.
customer_reviews.text: Great coffee. Love the flavor. I purchased a Breville Espresso Machine and this coffee is perfect for it. It has a roast date on it, so even though it might be more than 20 days old, it's averaging approximately 3 months old (so far) and it's certainly better than not having a roast date, as on other coffees I've purchased. Plus, it's shipped to my door.
customer_reviews.author: mylittleflicka

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, smooth espresso perfect for lattes!
customer_reviews.text: I love drinking slightly sweet lattes and I was struggling to find a tasty whole bean coffee that wasn't bitter at my local grocery stores. I was hooked on illy coffee for quite some time but as it became difficult to locate I decided to try something new and I'm glad I did! This is my second bag of Lavazza Super Crema Whole Bean Coffee blend and its been perfection both times! The beans have a hint of honey and sweet aromas! Its been perfect for making lattes that are not too bitter and not too sweet, I will definitely be purchasing more bags in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany L

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and perfect every time
customer_reviews.text: I've become insane about my coffee. I grind my beans and make it in a French Press. I try a lot of different coffees and generally prefer African and Indonesian coffees a bit better than South American coffees. Also, and most importantly, I drink my coffee black. And I keep coming back to Lavazza Super Crema Espresso because it's so smooth and yet full-bodied. It never bites you back. So I wander off and order other coffees, but I always come back to Super Crema. It's a perfect cup although not a super dark or overly strong one. Sometimes I think I should like something darker and more interesting better, but I don't.
customer_reviews.author: Jill C Jones

customer_reviews.title: I like to drink my coffee black but this is really strong
customer_reviews.text: Not my favorite! :( I like nutty flavor coffee and this is just not right for me. Too Strong, as soon as I opened the package I knew this is too strong for me. I wish they would offer smaller packages cause I don't know what to do with the rest of the package!
customer_reviews.author: Arefeh

customer_reviews.title: This product hits the spot for great espresso without breaking the bank
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of buying beans from various online boutique coffee houses and roasters. It just gets too expensive. This product hits the spot for great espresso without breaking the bank. The super crema is really very good tasting. I didn't like that the bag I received was roasted nearly 4 months ago since other reviews say they received very recent roasts. But I'll see how consistent that is next time I order. I use these in my Breville Oracle double boiler machine with the grinder set to about level 18 or 19. A tamp setting of 3 or 4 and a 30 second pull at 202 degrees F produces a great tasting double shot. Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie0504

customer_reviews.title: Espresso taste was very bitter.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Espresso after reading all the great reviews on how good it taste. I have an Oracle Touch machine which makes great Espresso shots. My wife and I thought it was extremely bitter so I had family over the next day and made drinks for everyone and everyone said how bitter the espresso was. I am very disappointed as thought the taste would be amazing. The MFD was 1/2018 so not sure if being packaged 5 months ago has to do with the bitter taste? Just wanted to share my experience with everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Good taste (for the money), terrible date/age of product
customer_reviews.text: I've bought the coffee beans nearly 10 times now. It tastes great, but what disturbs me the most is the age of the beans. Every order I've received has been about 12months AFTER the roast date. I've never gotten a "fresh" roast. Then again, $7/pound for beans is great. When I want something better, I'll buy from a local coffeeshop and pay about 2-3x per pound.
customer_reviews.author: iRenaissanceMan

customer_reviews.title: The Only Coffee I Will Buy Now
customer_reviews.text: I did a google search on the best coffee for latte and cappuccino. They mentioned Lavazza Super Crema and so I thought I would try it. OMG this stuff is so delicious! It is very creamy and doesn't have a strong bitter taste. It is my new favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Tiefenthaler

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE SAME COFFEE IN THE NEW PACKAGING!!!
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't write reviews, but here I am because I am disappointed in Lavazza coffee. When I first received the coffee in new packaging, I noticed that the beans are not that dark as I remember in the other packaging I used to get. Then I brew my cup of coffee ( espresso machine) - the coffee does not taste the same. I have been a big fan of Lavazza for a long time, recommended this coffee to all my friends and family and now I am disappointed in it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Unpleasant smell
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this based on the high reviews. On opening the bag I was surprised and disappointed to find that the beans have a strange, unpleasant, almost chemical smell. No coffee bean aroma. I was hesitant to try it. Taste when brewed was fine, unremarkable, but I will not order this product again. Manufacture date was 8 months prior to my purchase. Maybe I got a defective batch.
customer_reviews.author: From MN

customer_reviews.title: Fine coffee
customer_reviews.text: Liked it in mocha pot with milk. Have been roasted 2 month ago, but due to vacuum packaging stayed fresh. Doing pour over it does not bubble as much while blooming... Strong taste, worth trying and deciding if this taste is for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect fresh coffee.
customer_reviews.text: Coffee itself is good. I'm using it in my Jura Ena 9 One Touch. Not too bitter just as I like it. I was expecting a little bit more crema, but I use an all-in-on machine so I guess you can do better in a manual espresso machine . My review is not really about the coffee taste itself, it's more about the freshness. On my last order I received 2 bag of bean that have been roasted more than 9 month ago ! So don't expect fresh coffee, my first orders were more around 4 to 6 month old coffee but 9 is too much, had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: J.

customer_reviews.title: POSest POS ever
customer_reviews.text: Where is zero stars? One is way too much for this crap. Wanted to return it next second i tried it but Amazon has no such option like shops have. No smell of coffee AT ALL, have you seen that? It is 4 months since the production date but tastes like it was kept from the WWII
customer_reviews.author: Vslav

customer_reviews.title: 6 stars / 5
customer_reviews.text: Alot fresher than starbucks, costco beans, very nice bold but not toxic flavor. Loved the packaging, very recent dates printed on bag. Overall Really good tasting coffee, i'm not a pepe-le-peau coffee snob who notices "slight hints of hazelnut" but this is great and you do notice the slight flavors it has. If you see this at a good price below $15, go for it. Its great coffee.
customer_reviews.author: SK TECHNOLOGIES

customer_reviews.title: No good packing but for first time
customer_reviews.text: Excellent coffee but the last time the coffee packing had a little hole in the upper part and that probably affected the coffee's flavor. Update: I found a rock inside the coffee beans. I paid 60 $ repair fee for my brevill barista express because of this. I love this coffee blend and I have monthly subscription, but I have to cancel it. Very angry and dissatisfied with all this.
customer_reviews.author: Christakis Giotis

customer_reviews.title: Really Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The beans were extremely messy to grind and the coffee itself was quite weak and lacking in flavor. I expected much more from Lavazza. There are much less expensive brands with lesser renown that are far superior to this product.
customer_reviews.author: John L. Rigg

customer_reviews.title: Update: Great espresso
customer_reviews.text: I wrote a positive review a few months ago. These beans are now my go-to favorite. I’ve purchased many others, some good and some bad, but these are consistent and excellent. I’ve also been worried about the reviews that talk about rocks mixed into the beans, and ruining their grinder. So I’ve been inspecting the beans thoroughly, and have found no impurities whatsoever. Previous review: I purchased a high-end espresso maker a few months ago. I had been having trouble producing consistently good, non-bitter shots. I bought these beans based on their high reviews and am so glad that I did. My espresso is now perfect. Wish I had found these beans sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Grabs

customer_reviews.title: Great bean for a great espresso
customer_reviews.text: I just recently bought a new Breville espresso machine and this was my first bag of espresso beans. Being European, I'm very familiar with espresso brands and Lavazza has always been my preference. This blend did not disappoint at all - the coffee was smooth and creamy, when extracted right there was not a hint of bitterness or sourness (know how to make your espresso), it was like a good coffee shop experience. I've tried a couple of other blends since, trying to expand my choices, but this one has been far superior to the others.
customer_reviews.author: Armin O.

customer_reviews.title: Love the Lavazza whole bean coffee!
customer_reviews.text: This coffee is amazing! It is smooth! Medium strength which is great for me because I don't like strong coffee. The Super Crema is a superior coffee! Totally different from the pre-ground coffee! It makes a world of difference when you grind the whole bean right when you want to use it. Never going back to pre-ground again! Try it, you will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Rooshy

customer_reviews.title: Crema, clean, roasty
customer_reviews.text: I love the crema from my Jura A1 espresso machine. It's even better with this product. I was afraid of the cleanliness of the beans and processing because I am sensitive to chemicals and mold, and I found no claims regarding Lavazza's practices. However, I have been able to drink this coffee continuously without any apparent ill effects. This is the only medium roast coffee that I have liked. Others taste too fruity to me, but this one tastes just roasty enough.
customer_reviews.author: WeaverGrace

customer_reviews.title: The only coffee we buy
customer_reviews.text: Smooth, bold and rich flavor, this is our favorite coffee and we've been buying it on subscribe and save for over two years now. Other favorites of ours include mahogany from caribou, pikes place and illy for reference. Arrives in a airtight, sealed bag for ultimate freshness, and the flavor is second to none. In our household, where we make a 10-cup pot every day, the 2.2-pound bag will last us right around 30 days. Don't hesitate buying this one- it's really great.
customer_reviews.author: Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Premium flavor is the best anywhere
customer_reviews.text: Makes a great cup of coffee. I fine grind in a burr grinder and put it in simple paper filters in a refillable pod for my Keurig brewer. Then use Britta filtered water. This method won't produce much crema, but oh the taste! This medium roast allows the true coffee flavors to come through and is easier to tell the quality of the coffee. Keep well sealed after opening with a clip or transfer the beans to your own sealable container because this container won't reseal well on it's own. That's my only suggestion for improvement. would be a zip-lock style seal on the bag.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Always The Best Quality
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I discovered this brand I've loved it & won't drink any other type of brew coffee/espresso I've been overpaying for quite some time by buying it in the store already ground. I love how the package is the same as the packaging is in Italy in a unit of a kilogram which to me means it's right off the boat like my great grandfather was. So much more flavorful when you buy it as whole beans and grind it yourself! As a matter of fact, I'm drinking a cup as I'm writing this review. Mervigiloso cafe!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Barsotti

product_meta.title: Lavazza Super Crema Whole Bean Coffee Blend, Medium Espresso Roast, 2.2 Pound (Pack of 1)
product_meta.description: Style:Coffee| Flavor Name:Super Crema| Size:2.2 Pound (Pack of 1)Perfect for those who want a traditional espresso coffee that has a full, rich taste without a hint of bitterness. Has sweet aroma and sharp flavor, as well as an easily attainable thick, compact crema. Its natural sweetness is easy to enjoy without sugar. Lavazza's best-selling blend in the U.S. Whole beans, espresso roast. 60 percent Arabica/40 percent Robusta. Vacuum packed bag with one-way valve. Beverage Type: Coffee Flavor: Espresso Packing Type: Bag Capacity Weight: 2.2 lbs.
feature_bullets: One 2.2 pound bag of Lavazza Super Crema Italian whole coffee beans
Mild and creamy medium espresso roast with notes of hazelnuts and brown sugar
Produced in a nut-free facility center, Contains only coffee

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
